parameters.name: language

param_schema.description: Language spoken in the audio, specify 'auto' for automatic language detection

parameters.description: Language spoken in the audio, specify 'auto' for automatic language detection

parameters.name: patience

param_schema.title: Patience
param_schema.description: optional patience value to use in beam decoding, as in https://arxiv.org/abs/2204.05424, the default (1.0) is equivalent to conventional beam search

parameters.description: optional patience value to use in beam decoding, as in https://arxiv.org/abs/2204.05424, the default (1.0) is equivalent to conventional beam search

parameters.name: translate

param_schema.title: Translate
param_schema.description: Translate the text to English when set to True

parameters.description: Translate the text to English when set to True

parameters.name: transcription

param_schema.description: Choose the format for the transcription

parameters.description: Choose the format for the transcription

parameters.name: initial_prompt

param_schema.title: Initial Prompt
param_schema.description: optional text to provide as a prompt for the first window.

parameters.description: optional text to provide as a prompt for the first window.

parameters.name: suppress_tokens

param_schema.title: Suppress Tokens
param_schema.description: comma-separated list of token ids to suppress during sampling; '-1' will suppress most special characters except common punctuations

parameters.description: comma-separated list of token ids to suppress during sampling; '-1' will suppress most special characters except common punctuations

parameters.name: logprob_threshold

param_schema.title: Logprob Threshold
param_schema.description: if the average log probability is lower than this value, treat the decoding as failed

parameters.description: if the average log probability is lower than this value, treat the decoding as failed

parameters.name: no_speech_threshold

param_schema.title: No Speech Threshold
param_schema.description: if the probability of the <|nospeech|> token is higher than this value AND the decoding has failed due to `logprob_threshold`, consider the segment as silence

parameters.description: if the probability of the <|nospeech|> token is higher than this value AND the decoding has failed due to `logprob_threshold`, consider the segment as silence

parameters.name: condition_on_previous_text

param_schema.title: Condition On Previous Text
param_schema.description: if True, provide the previous output of the model as a prompt for the next window; disabling may make the text inconsistent across windows, but the model becomes less prone to getting stuck in a failure loop

parameters.description: if True, provide the previous output of the model as a prompt for the next window; disabling may make the text inconsistent across windows, but the model becomes less prone to getting stuck in a failure loop

parameters.name: compression_ratio_threshold

param_schema.title: Compression Ratio Threshold
param_schema.description: if the gzip compression ratio is higher than this value, treat the decoding as failed

parameters.description: if the gzip compression ratio is higher than this value, treat the decoding as failed

parameters.name: temperature_increment_on_fallback

param_schema.title: Temperature Increment On Fallback
param_schema.description: temperature to increase when falling back when the decoding fails to meet either of the thresholds below

parameters.description: temperature to increase when falling back when the decoding fails to meet either of the thresholds below

language.description: Language spoken in the audio, specify 'auto' for automatic language detection

patience.title: Patience
patience.description: optional patience value to use in beam decoding, as in https://arxiv.org/abs/2204.05424, the default (1.0) is equivalent to conventional beam search

transcription.description: Choose the format for the transcription

initial_prompt.title: Initial Prompt
initial_prompt.description: optional text to provide as a prompt for the first window.

suppress_tokens.title: Suppress Tokens
suppress_tokens.description: comma-separated list of token ids to suppress during sampling; '-1' will suppress most special characters except common punctuations

logprob_threshold.title: Logprob Threshold
logprob_threshold.description: if the average log probability is lower than this value, treat the decoding as failed

no_speech_threshold.title: No Speech Threshold
no_speech_threshold.description: if the probability of the <|nospeech|> token is higher than this value AND the decoding has failed due to `logprob_threshold`, consider the segment as silence

condition_on_previous_text.title: Condition On Previous Text
condition_on_previous_text.description: if True, provide the previous output of the model as a prompt for the next window; disabling may make the text inconsistent across windows, but the model becomes less prone to getting stuck in a failure loop

compression_ratio_threshold.title: Compression Ratio Threshold
compression_ratio_threshold.description: if the gzip compression ratio is higher than this value, treat the decoding as failed

temperature_increment_on_fallback.title: Temperature Increment On Fallback
temperature_increment_on_fallback.description: temperature to increase when falling back when the decoding fails to meet either of the thresholds below
